article.title: Marinette Dupain-Cheng
article.text:
{{good article}} {{Use mdy dates|date=December 2018}} {{Short description|Fictional character and protagonist of Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir}} {{Infobox character | color = #FFC0CB | name = Marinette Dupain-Cheng | series = [[Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir]] | image = Marinette Dupain-Cheng.png | image_upright = 1.15 | caption = Marinette Dupain-Cheng in her civilian form | alt = The female protagonist of the series ''Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir'' | first = "[[List of Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir episodes#Season 1 (2015–16)|Stormy Weather]]" (2015) | creator = Thomas Astruc | voice = '''English'''
[[Cristina Vee]]
'''French'''
Anouck Hautbois | lbl1 = Comparable to | data1 = [[Spider-Man]] | alias = Ladybug | species = Human
({{small|as Marinette}})
Ladybug-based [[superhuman]]
({{small|as Ladybug}}) | gender = Female | occupation = Student
[[Superhero]] | relatives = [[List of Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir characters#Tom Dupain|Tom Dupain]] (father)
[[List of Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir characters#Sabine Cheng|Sabine Cheng]] (mother)
Rolland Dupain
({{small|paternal grandfather}})
Gina Dupain
({{small|paternal grandmother}})
Wang Cheng
({{small|maternal great-uncle}}) | nationality = [[Chinese diaspora in France|French-Chinese]] | lbl21 = Hometown | data21 = [[Paris]] | lbl22 = Ability | data22 = Creation | lbl23 = Weapon | data23 = [[Yo-yo]] }} '''Marinette Dupain-Cheng''' is a [[fictional character]] and the female [[protagonist]] of the animated television series ''[[Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir]]'' created by Thomas Astruc. She is depicted as a [[Chinese diaspora in France|French-Chinese]] teenage student who aspires to become a [[fashion designer]] and whose parents own a bakery. After she passes the test of [[List of Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir characters#Master Fu|Master Fu]], the keeper of the magic objects named Miraculouses, by helping him, Marinette is picked as a future [[superhero]] alongside [[Cat Noir]]. As a result, she is given a pair of earrings known as the Ladybug Miraculous, which when worn grant Marinette the ability to transform into '''Ladybug''', her superhero alias. Unknown to Marinette, Cat Noir's civilian identity is [[Adrien Agreste]], whom she has a crush on. As the holder of a Miraculous, Marinette is assisted by a small red creature resembling a ladybug called [[List of Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir characters#Tikki|Tikki]], who is a magical being known as a kwami. As Ladybug, Marinette's signature ability is creation. Marinette appears in most ''Miraculous'' media, including the main series, the official mobile game, and the comic books. Marinette's character was inspired by a young woman wearing a ladybug-themed T-shirt whom Astruc once worked with. After creating a drawing that portrayed the woman as a ladybug-themed superhero, Astruc felt that this would be a good character, especially since he was not aware of the existence of another ladybug-related superhero. The woman's haircut served as inspiration for Marinette's hairstyle as well. Marinette is [[Voice acting|voiced]] by [[Cristina Vee]] in the English [[Dubbing (filmmaking)|dub]], while Anouck Hautbois voices her in the French version of the series. Marinette's character has received a generally positive critical response, with writers characterizing her as a role model for viewers and as a great protagonist; both her civilian self and her superhero identity have been praised. Meet-and-greet sessions containing Ladybug have taken place. Several pieces of merchandise based on her, such as accessories, clothing items, and action figures, have been created. ==Development== ==={{anchor|Conception and creation}}Concept and creation=== [[File:Marinette Dupain-Cheng as Ladybug.png|thumb|left|upright=0.85|Marinette Dupain-Cheng as her [[superhero]] [[alter ego]], Ladybug. Her creation was based on a young woman wearing a ladybug-themed T-shirt, who was on the production team of another series that also included Thomas Astruc; inspired by the shirt, Astruc drew the woman as a ladybug-themed superhero.|alt=Marinette Dupain-Cheng under her superhero identity]] The [[superhero]] identity of Marinette Dupain-Cheng, Ladybug, was inspired by a young woman wearing a T-shirt with a ladybug depicted on it;{{cite web|url=http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/article/television/91726/miraculous-le-createur-de-ladybug-devoile-les-secrets-de-sa-serie-a-succes-.html|title=Miraculous : le créateur de Ladybug dévoile les secrets de sa série à succès|date=March 16, 2016|last=Mercereau|first=Damien|newspaper=[[Le Figaro]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181204194032/http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/article/television/91726/miraculous-le-createur-de-ladybug-devoile-les-secrets-de-sa-serie-a-succes-.html|archive-date=December 4, 2018|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Miraculous : the creator of Ladybug reveals the secrets of his successful series|df=mdy-all}} she belonged to the production team of another show that also included Thomas Astruc, the creator of the animated television series ''[[Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir]]''.{{cite web|url=http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/thomas-astruc-avec-miraculous-nous-savons-ou-nous-voulons-aller-_351d4a80-b341-11e7-8aca-c6cafecb3960/|title=Thomas Astruc : «Avec Miraculous, nous savons où nous voulons aller»|date=October 27, 2017|last=Mercereau|first=Damien|newspaper=[[Le Figaro]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181204193552/http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/thomas-astruc-avec-miraculous-nous-savons-ou-nous-voulons-aller-_351d4a80-b341-11e7-8aca-c6cafecb3960/|archive-date=December 4, 2018|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Thomas Astruc: "With Miraculous, we know where we want to go"|df=mdy-all}}{{cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrSLlWH9uuY|title=101 PUR 100 #23 Thomas Astruc & Wilfried Pain (Miraculous Ladybug)|date=March 8, 2016|work=[[Nolife (TV channel)|Nolife]]|publisher=[[YouTube]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181114192531/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrSLlWH9uuY|archive-date=November 14, 2018|dead-url=no|language=French|df=mdy-all}} Astruc stated he had befriended her, and following this they had started creating and "exchanging ladybug-themed sticky notes";{{cite web|url=https://www.bsckids.com/2015/12/countdown-to-miraculous-is-on/|title=Countdown to Miraculous Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir Is On|date=December 4, 2015|last=Anders|first=Ella|work=BSCkids|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181204193835/https://www.bsckids.com/2015/12/countdown-to-miraculous-is-on/|archive-date=December 4, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} a note drawn by Astruc portrayed the woman as a ladybug-themed superhero. Astruc did not know of the existence of a ladybug-related superhero and felt this character would be good. As a result, Ladybug's character was conceptualized. Marinette's hairstyle was also conceived using the woman's haircut as a model. Astruc said that Ladybug's power was connected to luck since ladybugs are associated with good luck. He commented that Ladybug's character is comparable to [[Spider-Man]]. Astruc described Ladybug as an "awesome", very positive, and bright character. He also characterized her as a character that brings happiness, as well as his favorite character from the series.{{cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_VhFsvdargs|title=Interview - Thomas Astruc - DoKomi 2016|date=January 18, 2017|work=DoKomi|publisher=[[YouTube]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181114191645/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_VhFsvdargs|archive-date=November 14, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} Astruc stated that he hoped Ladybug would become the mascot of [[Paris]], being found on flyers at museums' entrances to inspire children to visit them. In regard to Marinette and [[Adrien Agreste]], he commented that he had wished to depict "sunny", inspiring characters. He said that handling the dynamics between Marinette and Adrien's two identities was entertaining. Astruc stated that couples of superheroes like the one consisting of Ladybug and [[Cat Noir]] are uncommon in shows, and he felt that the viewers enjoy the love situation formed between the two of them. A source of inspiration for the duo of the ladybug and the black cat was one of Astruc's previous romantic relationships.{{cite web|url=http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/article/television/89236/miraculous-va-enchanter-tfou%C2%A0-sur-tf1.html|title=Miraculous va enchanter TFou ! sur TF1|date=October 18, 2015|last=Gascoin|first=Patrice|newspaper=[[Le Figaro]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181204201904/http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/article/television/89236/miraculous-va-enchanter-tfou%C2%A0-sur-tf1.html|archive-date=December 4, 2018|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Miraculous will delight TFou ! on TF1|df=mdy-all}} Ladybug's costume was difficult to animate when it came to the original 2D version since it was red with black dots; the dots had to be in certain spots and had to remain unmoved. In the 3D version, this problem disappeared due to there being a model moving. In the 2D version, Marinette was supposed to be older than she currently is in the 3D version. The [[chibi]] design of Ladybug from the series [[List of Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir episodes#Miraculous Zag Chibi|''Miraculous Chibi'']] was conceived by character designer Angie Nasca.{{cite web|url=http://www.animationmagazine.net/animated-people/angie-nasca-designs-bite-size-zag-heroez-for-miraculous-chibi/|title=Angie Nasca Designs Bite-Size ZAG Heroez for 'Miraculous Chibi'|date=November 16, 2018|last=Milligan|first=Mercedes|magazine=[[Animation Magazine]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181204202240/http://www.animationmagazine.net/animated-people/angie-nasca-designs-bite-size-zag-heroez-for-miraculous-chibi/|archive-date=December 4, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} The bakery of Marinette's family was inspired by a real-life Parisian bakery. Astruc commented that deciding on how Ladybug would use a certain item created with the help of her Miraculous to defeat the villain takes a quarter of the writers' working time for an episode; Sébastien Thibaudeau, the writing director of ''Miraculous'', stated that Ladybug is intelligent since she manages to do what in reality several people can think of only when collaborating with each other.{{cite web|url=http://www.onirik.net/Conference-avec-les-scenaristes-de|title=Conférence avec les scénaristes de Miraculous, les aventures de Ladybug et Chat Noir|date=June 30, 2019|work=Onirik|access-date=July 13, 2019|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190713005654/http://www.onirik.net/Conference-avec-les-scenaristes-de|archive-date=July 13, 2019|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Conference with the writers of Miraculous, the adventures of Ladybug and Chat Noir|df=mdy-all}} According to Thibaudeau, the writers wanted Marinette to not be based on clichés and to resemble a contemporary girl, able to create things and desiring to achieve something in life; they also wished Marinette's transformation into a self-assured superhero to show that people can change and become stronger. Marinette is also meant to highlight that one has to fight and be open-minded and smart in order to be successful in life.{{cite web|url=https://www.lalibre.be/culture/medias-tele/avec-lady-bug-les-filles-prennent-le-pouvoir-59e8adb1cd7095e2f70481fe|title=Avec "Lady Bug", les filles prennent le pouvoir|date=October 22, 2017|last=Gourdin|first=Caroline|newspaper=[[La Libre Belgique]]|access-date=July 14, 2019|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190714231130/https://www.lalibre.be/culture/medias-tele/avec-lady-bug-les-filles-prennent-le-pouvoir-59e8adb1cd7095e2f70481fe|archive-date=July 14, 2019|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=With "Lady Bug", girls take power|df=mdy-all}} Thibaudeau said Marinette tries to improve Adrien's difficult life. Fred Lenoir, also writing for ''Miraculous'', stated that Marinette's relationship with Adrien, both as civilians and as superheroes, is the main part of the show. [[Jeremy Zag]], the president of the animation studio [[Zagtoon]], characterized Marinette as "a fresh and modern girl character who is in line with kids' and teens' lives today".{{cite web|url=https://www.licenseglobal.com/toys-games/bandai-plans-%E2%80%98ladybug%E2%80%99-toys|title=Bandai Plans 'Ladybug' Toys|date=February 4, 2014|work=License Global|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181205122509/https://www.licenseglobal.com/toys-games/bandai-plans-%E2%80%98ladybug%E2%80%99-toys|archive-date=December 5, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} The first two images depicting Ladybug released by Zag, one showing her portrait and one featuring her on a roof in Paris, received enough attention to go around the world. Zag said the love situation that Marinette created alongside Adrien, their superhero identities, and their secrets represent some of the main parts of the story.{{cite web|url=https://www.telez.fr/actus-tv/miraculous-les-aventures-de-ladybug-et-chat-noir-bientot-un-film-une-serie-en-live-action-et-une-comedie-musicale/|title=Miraculous, les aventures de Ladybug et Chat noir : bientôt un film, une série en live action et une comédie musicale|date=April 5, 2018|last=Charlet|first=Justine|work=TéléZ|access-date=December 12, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181212155105/https://www.telez.fr/actus-tv/miraculous-les-aventures-de-ladybug-et-chat-noir-bientot-un-film-une-serie-en-live-action-et-une-comedie-musicale/|archive-date=December 12, 2018|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Miraculous, the adventures of Ladybug and Chat Noir : soon a film, a live action series and a musical|df=mdy-all}} Jared Wolfson, the executive producer of ''Miraculous'', stated that the audience of girls had been waiting for "someone like a Spider-Man to come along", and that now due to Ladybug's character, they can transform into her, becoming "stronger" and making "an effect in the world".{{cite web|url=https://thekitsunetwork.net/2015/12/24/miraculous-ladybug-interview/|title=Interview with: Miraculous Ladybug executive producer, Jared Wolfson|date=December 24, 2015|work=The Kitsune Network|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181211202425/https://thekitsunetwork.net/2015/12/24/miraculous-ladybug-interview/|archive-date=December 11, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} With regard to Ladybug's character, [[Method Animation#Aton Soumache|Aton Soumache]], the chief executive officer of the company [[Method Animation]],{{cite web|url=http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/miraculous-les-secrets-de-la-saison-2-de-ladybug-et-chat-noir_d32cc720-a2c3-11e7-b619-f944cd28c6f6/|title=Miraculous : les secrets de la saison 2 de Ladybug et Chat Noir|date=September 26, 2017|last=Mercereau|first=Damien|newspaper=[[Le Figaro]]|access-date=December 12, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181212140803/http://tvmag.lefigaro.fr/programme-tv/miraculous-les-secrets-de-la-saison-2-de-ladybug-et-chat-noir_d32cc720-a2c3-11e7-b619-f944cd28c6f6/|archive-date=December 12, 2018|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Miraculous : the secrets of season 2 of Ladybug and Chat Noir|df=mdy-all}}{{cite web|url=http://www.allocine.fr/diaporamas/series/diaporama-18668201/|title=Super-héros, girl-power, Paris et... Dany Boon : pleins feux sur la saison 2 de Miraculous|date=October 26, 2017|last=Sardet|first=Yoann|work=AlloCiné|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181205002413/http://www.allocine.fr/diaporamas/series/diaporama-18668201/|archive-date=December 5, 2018|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Superheroes, girl-power, Paris and... Dany Boon : spotlight on season 2 of Miraculous|df=mdy-all}} said the producers had wished to "create a [glamorous] superhero character with a real European flair with Paris as backdrop",{{cite web|url=https://variety.com/2010/film/news/duo-prep-s3d-superhero-toon-1118025064/|title=Duo prep S3D superhero toon|date=October 4, 2010|last=Keslassy|first=Elsa|magazine=[[Variety (magazine)|Variety]]|access-date=December 13, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181213133000/https://variety.com/2010/film/news/duo-prep-s3d-superhero-toon-1118025064/|archive-date=December 13, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} as a result of the previous lack of an action series centered on a female superhero.{{cite web|url=https://www.ouest-france.fr/medias/television/serie-d-animation-miraculous-coccinelle-porte-bonheur-de-tfou-6154758|title=Série d'animation. Miraculous, coccinelle porte-bonheur de Tfou|date=December 30, 2018|last=Olivier|first=Clémence|work=Ouest-France|access-date=July 13, 2019|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190713013811/https://www.ouest-france.fr/medias/television/serie-d-animation-miraculous-coccinelle-porte-bonheur-de-tfou-6154758|archive-date=July 13, 2019|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Animation series. Miraculous, lucky ladybug from Tfou|df=mdy-all}} Nicole D'Andria, a contributor to the creation of a ''Miraculous'' comic book, said Ladybug is an admirable character.{{cite web|url=http://www.actionlabcomics.com/2017/09/20/miraculous-adventures-volume-1-the-original-comic-book-adventures-of-ladybug-and-cat-noir-collected-into-one-action-packed-volume/|title=Miraculous Adventures Volume 1: The original comic book adventures of Ladybug and Cat Noir collected into one action-packed volume!|publisher=[[Action Lab Comics]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181207222716/http://www.actionlabcomics.com/2017/09/20/miraculous-adventures-volume-1-the-original-comic-book-adventures-of-ladybug-and-cat-noir-collected-into-one-action-packed-volume/|archive-date=December 7, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} [[Zagtoon|ZAG America]]'s president of global consumer products, André Lake Mayer, stated that children are fond of Ladybug's character,{{cite web|url=https://www.licensing.biz/entertainment/miraculous-taps-winning-moves-and-ipanema-sandals-for-emea|title=Miraculous taps Winning Moves and Ipanema Sandals for EMEA|date=August 22, 2018|last=Hutchins|first=Robert|magazine=[[Licensing.biz]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181207225558/https://www.licensing.biz/entertainment/miraculous-taps-winning-moves-and-ipanema-sandals-for-emea|archive-date=December 7, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} and that the fans would enjoy playing as Ladybug in the official ''Miraculous'' mobile game.{{cite web|url=http://www.animationmagazine.net/gaming/zag-taps-tabtale-for-first-official-miraculous-ladybug-mobile-game/|title=ZAG Taps TabTale for First Official 'Miraculous Ladybug' Mobile Game|date=March 6, 2018|last=Milligan|first=Mercedes|magazine=[[Animation Magazine]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181207221619/http://www.animationmagazine.net/gaming/zag-taps-tabtale-for-first-official-miraculous-ladybug-mobile-game/|archive-date=December 7, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}}{{cite web|url=https://www.licensing.biz/video-games/miraculous-tales-of-ladybug-and-cat-noir-is-getting-its-first-mobile-game-next-month|title=Miraculous - Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir is getting its first mobile game next month|date=March 7, 2018|last=Hutchins|first=Robert|magazine=[[Licensing.biz]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181207222038/https://www.licensing.biz/video-games/miraculous-tales-of-ladybug-and-cat-noir-is-getting-its-first-mobile-game-next-month|archive-date=December 7, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} She felt Ladybug "is instantaneously empowering to all women, all ages", saying that she "is mesmerizing both as Marinette and as Ladybug". Mayer stated that "even without knowing the story", "she is instinctively familiar, authentic and strong", adding that "Ladybug is an icon for wholesome girl empowerment". ===Voice=== [[File:Day 3 Meet Christine Marie Cabanos and Cristina Vee (33878970146) (cropped).jpg|thumb|upright=0.8|[[Cristina Vee]] [[Voice acting|voices]] Marinette in the English version of the series.|alt=An image with Marinette's English voice actress, Cristina Vee]] [[Cristina Vee]] [[Voice acting|voices]] Marinette in the English [[Dubbing (filmmaking)|dub]].{{cite web|url=http://www.animationmagazine.net/features/news-bytes-miraculous-at-comic-con-imagen-awards-ipi-soft-v-4-and-more/|title=News Bytes: 'Miraculous' at Comic-Con, Imagen Awards, iPi Soft V.4, and More|date=July 9, 2018|last=Zahed|first=Ramin|magazine=[[Animation Magazine]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181204223334/http://www.animationmagazine.net/features/news-bytes-miraculous-at-comic-con-imagen-awards-ipi-soft-v-4-and-more/|archive-date=December 4, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} Vee stated that she loves Marinette, describing her as one of her favorite characters that she voiced. She said Marinette reminds her of the character [[Sailor Moon (character)|Sailor Moon]], commenting that "working on the show" had given her "the same feelings" as the ones she had experienced while "watching ''[[Sailor Moon (TV series)|Sailor Moon]]'' growing up as a kid".{{cite web|url=https://thekitsunetwork.net/2016/04/02/interview-with-cristina-vee/|title=Interview With: Cristina Vee|date=April 2, 2016|work=The Kitsune Network|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181205120941/https://thekitsunetwork.net/2016/04/02/interview-with-cristina-vee/|archive-date=December 5, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} She stated that she had auditioned for Marinette's role considerably, most likely more than she had previously done for other characters. Vee said she had first received the script for the audition around a year before being cast, adding that she had not received a reply after reading it. Following this, she had obtained the script once again, and after reading it, she received two callbacks. She stated that ever since she had seen Marinette's character design and the script, she had known that "whoever was cast as this character, Ladybug, would be the luckiest girl", precisely "the luckiest voice actress". After reading the script for the first time, Vee felt that Marinette was a version "on paper" of herself.{{cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oqgJkRsJLs8|title=Miraculous News Network - Cristina Vee and Lindalee - Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir|date=October 7, 2016|publisher=[[YouTube]]|access-date=July 16, 2019|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20170317174131/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oqgJkRsJLs8|archive-date=March 17, 2017|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} Vee said she had fallen in love with Ladybug immediately. She commented that she had not been aware of this show's existence before auditioning for Marinette's role, which surprised her since she kept herself up to date with [[anime]]-related news. After auditioning and before receiving the callback, she found out about the anime promotional video of the series. After seeing the video, she started wanting the role all the more. Vee said that she resembles Marinette very much, sometimes being "pretty shy and clumsy" and stumbling over her "words and feet". While she liked that Marinette is affectionate toward Adrien and "mixes up her words sometimes", Vee regarded "fighting crime as Ladybug" as "her favorite part" of voicing her, stating that she enjoyed the moments when Marinette says her specific phrases for her transformation into Ladybug and for using her signature superhero ability. She mentioned that Marinette and Adrien learning about each other's identities would be "exciting", adding that she wished to see how they would "work together in a different way to fight crime". Vee characterized this show as "amazing", stating that she had never seen an animation like this before and that "every episode is just so beautiful". She described the second season of the series as "awesome".{{cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xl74Ahs710I|title=Miraculous - SDCC 2018 w Lindalee Pt II - Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir|date=August 2, 2018|publisher=[[YouTube]]|access-date=July 16, 2019|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190621210525/https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xl74Ahs710I|archive-date=June 21, 2019|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} Regarding the [[List of Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir episodes#Specials|Christmas special episode]], Vee hoped it would contain moments centered on Marinette and Adrien. Jared Wolfson stated that Vee is energetic. He said she has a "beautiful personality", describing her as "so sweet", "so kind", and "great". He stated that in the recording studio, Vee "goes from sweet Marinette to Ladybug", adding that "she is Ladybug in that room" and that this is "so fun to watch". has been generally positive, with writers describing her as a famous character,{{cite web|url=http://www.lefigaro.fr/sortir-paris/ete-2019-que-faire-a-paris-avec-les-enfants-de-moins-de-10-ans-20190702|title=Été 2019: que faire à Paris avec les enfants de moins de 10 ans?|date=July 2, 2019|last1=Béguerie|first1=Sophie|last2=Jérôme|first2=Nathalie|last3=Sollier|first3=Anne|last4=Terraz|first4=Pierre|newspaper=[[Le Figaro]]|access-date=July 8, 2019|dead-url=no|language=French|trans-title=Summer 2019: what to do in Paris with children under 10 years old?|df=mdy-all}} and as clever, pretty, sweet,{{cite web|url=http://movieforkids.bestmovie.it/news/miraculous-ladybug-10-curiosita-che-non-sapete-su-ladybug-e-chat-noir/53653/|title=Miraculous Ladybug, 10 curiosità che non sapete su LadyBug e Chat 2018|dead-url=no|language=Italian|trans-title=Miraculous Ladybug, 10 curiosities you do not know about LadyBug and Chat Noir|df=mdy-all}} and inventive. Emily Ashby of ''[[Common Sense Media]]'' characterized Marinette as "patient" and "kind".{{cite web|url=https://www.commonsensemedia.org/tv-reviews/miraculous-tales-of-ladybug-cat-noir|title=Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir|last=Ashby|first=Emily|work=[[Common Sense Media]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181204223009/https://www.commonsensemedia.org/tv-reviews/miraculous-tales-of-ladybug-cat-noir|archive-date=December 4, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} ''[[ComicsVerse]]'' writer Michele Kirichanskaya felt that the series "takes the time to address Marinette's heritage" in "a subtle and respectful manner", such as the "moments when she struggles with speaking Chinese" and has "cultural miscommunications with relatives".{{cite web|url=https://comicsverse.com/miraculous-ladybug-must-see-french-superhero-carto/|title=Miraculous Ladybug: The Must See French Superhero Cartoon|date=May 9, 2017|last=Kirichanskaya|first=Michele|work=[[ComicsVerse]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181204202500/https://comicsverse.com/miraculous-ladybug-must-see-french-superhero-carto/|archive-date=December 4, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} Kirichanskaya wrote that Marinette's complete name when "translated from both Chinese and French languages" is "appropriate for a girl whose family owns a bakery". She described Marinette as "loyal and devoted to her friends and family". Kirichanskaya said Marinette being "an aspiring fashion designer" that makes "new creations in her spare time" shows that "feminine interests [do not] necessarily detract from superheroic qualities", deeming this "a positive message for male and female viewers alike". She thought that the feelings Marinette has for Adrien "only define one aspect of her character". Caroline Gourdin of ''[[La Libre Belgique]]'' stated that Marinette's character is one of the main aspects of the series, adding that she can appeal to both girls and boys. ''Nerd Much?'' writer Emily Auten felt that "Marinette's [[Shōjo manga|shoujo]]-like crush on Adrien" is one of the "small aspects that anime fans can appreciate" in this series.{{cite web|url=https://www.nerdmuch.com/tv/6877/miraculous-ladybug-is-the-best-new-cartoon-anime-to-watch-nickelodeon/|title=Miraculous Ladybug: 10 Reasons Why It's The Best New Cartoon|date=October 30, 2018|last=Auten|first=Emily|work=Nerd Much?|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181204225823/https://www.nerdmuch.com/tv/6877/miraculous-ladybug-anime/|archive-date=December 4, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} Auten stated that while "there are not enough female main heroes in shows", "Marinette takes center stage as one of the main protagonists"; she also wrote that "Marinette is a great female protagonist". Auten said Marinette is "very well-written", stating that she is "a great role model" for both children and adults "to look up to and relate with". She praised Cristina Vee's role as Marinette's voice actress. An ''[[El Intransigente]]'' writer said that the main protagonist of this series is a girl, unlike how it happens in other shows, and that Marinette has a big heart.{{cite web|url=https://www.elintransigente.com/espectaculo/celebrities/2016/1/26/conoce-nueva-serie-revoluciono-industria-animacion-365181.html|title=Conocé la nueva serie que revolucionó la industria de la animación|date=January 26, 2016|newspaper=[[El Intransigente]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181204192909/https://www.elintransigente.com/espectaculo/celebrities/2016/1/26/conoce-nueva-serie-revoluciono-industria-animacion-365181.html|archive-date=December 4, 2018|dead-url=yes|language=Spanish|trans-title=Meet the new series that revolutionized the animation industry|df=mdy-all}} Marinette was commented to have "innocent optimism".{{cite web|url=http://blog.nj.com/north_american_precis_syndicate/2016/02/superheroes_to_rule_the_playroom_and_beyond.html|title=SuperHERoes To Rule The Playroom And Beyond|date=February 10, 2016|work=[[NJ.com]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181205193236/http://blog.nj.com/north_american_precis_syndicate/2016/02/superheroes_to_rule_the_playroom_and_beyond.html|archive-date=December 5, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} Marinette's superhero form, Ladybug, has been commended. Elle Collins of ''[[ComicsAlliance]]'' said the way "Marinette transforms into Ladybug in a series of twirls and poses" resembles how "Sailor Moon and other [[magical girl]]s always do".{{cite web|url=http://comicsalliance.com/gdpr/consent/?redirect=/nickelodeon-ladybug-cat-noir/|title=Teen French Heroes Ladybug & Cat Noir Arrive On Nickelodeon This Sunday|date=December 3, 2015|last=Collins|first=Elle|work=[[ComicsAlliance]]|access-date=December 10, 2018|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20181211202356/http://comicsalliance.com/nickelodeon-ladybug-cat-noir/|archive-date=December 11, 2018|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} She felt that Marinette having "the guidance of some kind of talking ladybug creature" completes "another Magical Girl trope". ''[[Los Angeles Times]]'' writer Robert Lloyd commented that Marinette is a "smart girl" and characterized her superhero form as "a costumed crusader".{{cite web|url=https://www.latimes.com/entertainment/tv/la-et-st-ladybug-and-cat-noir-comes-to-dvd-20160826-snap-story.html|title='Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir,' a French turn on teenage superheroes|date=August 27, 2016|last=Lloyd|first=Robert|newspaper=[[Los Angeles Times]]|access-date=January 27, 2019|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190127230441/https://www.latimes.com/entertainment/tv/la-et-st-ladybug-and-cat-noir-comes-to-dvd-20160826-snap-story.html|archive-date=January 27, 2019|dead-url=no|df=mdy-all}} Michele Kirichanskaya stated that while Marinette initially "appears to be just an ordinary girl", with the help of "a pair of magical earrings" she "can transform into the Miraculous Ladybug, one of Paris's greatest superheroes". She described Marinette as "a bright, talented, creative young woman, trying to balance her daily life with all the responsibilities that entail being France's greatest superheroine". Kirichanskaya characterized Ladybug as "an incredible hero" that is "fluid and confident in battle". She felt that "Marinette embodies the most" of both her ordinary and superhero lives "in a beautiful force of a character".
